answers.answer: ED can be caused by several different health issues.  ED happens more in older people because many health issues cause the problem.You need to be checked for diabetes, thyroid problems.  Besides those, it could be a plain vascular problem or a nerve problem.Look up neem.  It can treat diabetes and other causes of ED.For vascular issues, L-arginine and maca and I think creatinine are all beneficial.  Increase your exercise and eat a healthy diet too.But don't neglect your health.
